customers_service module

customers_service.api_add_customer()[source]

API endpoint to add a new customer.

Returns:

JSON response containing the added customer information

Return type:

JSON

customers_service.api_charge_customer()[source]

API endpoint to charge a customer’s wallet.

Returns:

JSON response confirming the successful charge

Return type:

JSON

customers_service.api_charge_goods()[source]

API endpoint to charge a customer for goods.

Returns:

JSON response confirming the successful charge for goods

Return type:

JSON

customers_service.api_deduct_customer()[source]

API endpoint to deduct an amount from a customer’s wallet.

Returns:

JSON response confirming the successful deduction.

Return type:

JSON

customers_service.api_delete_customer(username)[source]

API endpoint to delete a customer based on the provided username.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer to be deleted

Returns:

JSON response containing the deleted customer confirmation message

Return type:

JSON

customers_service.api_get_customer(username)[source]

API endpoint to retrieve customer information based on the provided username.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer

Returns:

JSON response containing the customer information

Return type:

JSON

customers_service.api_get_customers()[source]

API endpoint to retrieve a list of all customers.

Returns:

JSON response containing the list of customers

Return type:

JSON

customers_service.api_update_customer()[source]

API endpoint to update customer information.

Returns:

JSON response containing the updated customer information

Return type:

JSON
